File libsrc/libgobject/Overlaps.c

This class computes the time periods where an arbitrary number of TimeSeries objects overlap. The data for each period of data overlap are available as an enumeration of Array objects. 
  typedef struct 
  {   
 	GObjectPart		core;
 
 	TimeSeries		*ts;
 	int			ts_length;
 	double			tdel = 0.;
 	double			tdel_tolerance = 0.;
 	Vector			lap_segments;
 	double			*lap_tmin;
 	double			*lap_tmax;
 	Enumeration		e_seg;
  } *Overlaps

See Also:

Public Function Index

new_Overlaps (TimeSeries *, int)
Create an Overlap object for the TimeSeries[] array.
new_Overlaps2 (TimeSeries *, int, double, double)
Create an Overlap object for the TimeSeries[] array for the time period tmin to tmax.
Overlaps_hasMoreElements (Overlaps)
Return true if there are more time periods of overlpping data.
Overlaps_nextElement (Overlaps)
Return the next Array object with the overlapping data.
Overlaps_getArrays (TimeSeries *, int, double, double)
new_SegmentArray (double, double, int, int, Segment *, int *)
Create a SegmentArray object.
